titles.title: Of inquiry requesting the President of the United States to provide certain information to the House of Representatives respecting the National Energy Policy Development Group.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Air Quality.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

action.text: Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported Unfavorably by the Yeas and Nays: 30 - 22.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

action.text: Reported adversely by the Committee on Energy and Commerce. H. Rept. 108-697.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 228.

bill.summary: 9/23/2004--Reported to House without amendment. Requests the President to furnish the House of Representatives the following information respecting the National Energy Policy Development Group (task force): (1) the name of each individual who was present at each of the group meetings conducted by the task force; (2) the names of the professional staff assigned to provide support to the task force; (3) the names of all individuals with whom each member of the task force (including the Vice President as chairman) and each support staff met to gather information for the National Energy Policy, including the date, subject, and location of each such meeting; and (4) the direct and indirect costs incurred in developing the National Energy Policy.
